properties.description: Create a pipeline to fetch the 5 countries (india,us,uk,china,russia) data from Rest API (https://restcountries.com/v3.1/name/{name} here replace the {name} with Country name like https://restcountries.com/v3.1/name/us) and save it in separate file as JSON with File name equal to Country name.
